author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
Define a new eventcontent SIML1RAW, made up of
- simMuonDEBUG
- simCaloDEBUG
- L1TriggerDEBUG
- RAW

It contains all the data products necessary for full L1T re-emulation plus the FEDRaw. Its event size is about 0.3 MB, or about 1/5 that of FEVTDEBUG.

For the re-emulation of L1T, L1REPACK step is augmented with two more options:
- L1REPACK:CALOuGT to re-emulate and re-pack Calo Layer-2 and uGT (use already simulated uGMT)
- L1REPACK:uGT re-emulate and re-pack only uGT (use already simulated Calo and uGMT)

More details describing the on the twiki:
https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/EventContentSIML1RAW

This should cleanly merge with PR for all the L1T code update to 80x, i.e. #13767
title: New eventcontent SIML1RAW. 2-step (L1T re-emulation) MC production workflow on GEN-SIM,
